'''Google Inc.''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], specializing in [[Internet search]] and [[online advertising]]. The company is based in [[Mountain View, California]], and has 15,916 full-time employees (as of [[September 30]] [[2007]]).<ref>"[http://www.google.com/press/pressrel/revenues_q307.html Google Announces Third Quarter 2007 Results]." October 18, 2007. Retrieved on [[October 22]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's mission statement is, "to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful."<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/ Google Corporate Information: Company Overview]." ''Google.'' Retrieved on [[January 6]], [[2007]].</ref> It is the largest American company (by [[market capitalization]]) that is not part of the [[Dow Jones Industrial Average]]. Google's corporate philosophy includes statements such as "Don't be evil" and "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun", illustrating a somewhat relaxed corporate culture.
'''Google Inc.''' ({{nasdaq|GOOG}} and {{lse|GGEA}}) is an [[United States|American]] [[public company|public corporation]], specializing in [[Internet search]] and [[online advertising]]. The company is based in [[Mountain View, California]], and has 15,916 full-time employees (as of [[September 30]] [[2007]]).<ref>"[http://www.google.com/press/pressrel/revenues_q307.html Google Announces Third Quarter 2007 Results]." October 18, 2007. Retrieved on [[October 22]], [[2007]].</ref> Google's mission statement is, "to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful."<ref>"[http://www.google.com/corporate/ Google Corporate Information: Company Overview]." ''Google.'' Retrieved on [[January 6]], [[2007]].</ref> It is the largest American company (by [[market capitalization]]) that is not part of the [[Dow Jones Industrial Average]]. Google's corporate philosophy includes statements such as "Don't be evil" and "Work should be challenging and the challenge should be fun", illustrating a somewhat relaxed corporate culture.
